doc.description: Video streaming for Linux based devices. Works e.g. in conjunction with Parrot Drones where the autopilot is the Paparazzi autopilot. Sends a RTP/UDP stream of the camera image, a.k.a. live video

configure.name: VIEWVIDEO_USE_NETCAT
configure.description: Use netcat for transferring images instead of RTP stream (default: FALSE)

configure.name: VIEWVIDEO_BROADCAST
configure.description: Enable broadcast of image stream (default: TRUE)

define.name: VIEWVIDEO_DOWNSIZE_FACTOR
define.description: Reduction factor of the video stream, the image width and height should be divisible by this factor

define.name: VIEWVIDEO_FPS
define.description: Image frequency for the RTP viewer (recommended >=5Hz)

define.name: VIEWVIDEO_USE_RTP
define.description: Enable RTP at startup for transferring images (default: TRUE)

makefile.raw:
include $(CFG_SHARED)/udp.makefile
VIEWVIDEO_HOST ?= $(MODEM_HOST) VIEWVIDEO_PORT_OUT ?= 5000 VIEWVIDEO_PORT2_OUT ?= 6000 VIEWVIDEO_BROADCAST ?= TRUE VIEWVIDEO_USE_NETCAT ?= FALSE
VIEWVID_CFLAGS = -DVIEWVIDEO_HOST=$(VIEWVIDEO_HOST) -DVIEWVIDEO_PORT_OUT=$(VIEWVIDEO_PORT_OUT) -DVIEWVIDEO_PORT2_OUT=$(VIEWVIDEO_PORT2_OUT) ifneq (,$(findstring $(VIEWVIDEO_USE_NETCAT),0 FALSE)) ap.CFLAGS += $(VIEWVID_CFLAGS) -DVIEWVIDEO_BROADCAST=$(VIEWVIDEO_BROADCAST) nps.CFLAGS += $(VIEWVID_CFLAGS) -DVIEWVIDEO_BROADCAST=FALSE else $(TARGET).CFLAGS += $(VIEWVID_CFLAGS) -DVIEWVIDEO_USE_NETCAT endif
